feed.title: Announcing bip174.org, a web-based PSBT viewer and editor

entry.title: Announcing bip174.org, a web-based PSBT viewer and editor
entry.summary: The user has suggested the implementation of a light and dark theme switch option and color highlighting feature in a project. The response suggests that they are not skilled at UI/UX, but are willing to give it a try. The user also mentions the possibility of a similar project for experimenting with descriptors. The response offers a link to a web-based tool for building descriptors graphically based on Scratch, which can be found on BDK's website.
